'''The Lord of the Rings & The Two Towers''' is a collection of the games [[J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings, Vol. I (1990 computer game)|The Lord of the Rings, Vol. I]] and [[J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings, Vol. II: The Two Towers|The Two Towers]].<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/bundle.html The Lord of the Rings & The Two Towers] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 26 March 2011)</ref><ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=7 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 8 (retrieved 26 March 2011)</ref> It was licensed by the [[Tolkien Estate]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
